Descendants.Name: Blitzjager
Descendants.Trait:
Occupier (I may remain on an enemy holding after an attack if there are no defenders. While I'm there, that holding does not untap and loses all abilities.)
+1 FORCE in low-g environments.

Descendants.Name: Versteckter Soldat
Descendants.Trait: Stealth (I'm unblockable except by descendants with greater or equal VECTOR).

Descendants.Name: Artillerietrooper
Descendants.Trait:
Slow,
When I attack, deal 1 FORCE/SYNC damage to any target at my battlefield.

Descendants.Name: Geistpaher
Descendants.Trait:
Nervous System Domination (I may make PSYCHE attacks. Find the difference between my PSYCHE and my target's below:
0: Target doesn't attack this combat
1: Target is killed.
2: I choose how the target attacks this combat
3: I gain control of the target until the end of your next turn.
4: I gain permanent control of the target.

Descendants.Name: Gravitengenior
Descendants.Trait: When I attack, change my battlefield's gravity.

Descendants.Name: Marsfeldherr
Descendants.Trait:
Occcupier (I may remain on an enemy holding after an attack if there are no defenders. While I'm there, that holding does not untap and loses all abilities.)
When I attack, your other descendants get +1 FORCE and +1 SYNC.

Descendants.Name: Marsdominus
Descendants.Trait:
Slow, Prevent all sources of 1 damage,
Occupier (I may remain on an enemy holding after an attack if there are no defenders. While I'm there, that holding does not untap and loses all abilities.)

Descendants.Name: Kommandant Wolfgang
Descendants.Trait:
Conqueror (I can occupy an enemy territory with population. If I occupy a holding at the start of your turn, gain control of it.)
When you gain control of a populated holding I occupied, you may sacrifice the population to gain that much materia.

Descendants.Name: Kommandant Reinhart
Descendants.Trait: Tap, sacrifice a population: Create a Lurking Horror with "Force 2, Psyche 1, Vector 0, Sync 3. Tap: Move to target vessel or holding and attack. No more than one unit may defend." Activate this ability only if I'm at a non-martian holding.

Descendants.Name: Frau Doktor Volkova
Descendants.Trait:
Conqueror (I can occupy an enemy territory with population. If I occupy a holding at the start of your turn, gain control of it.)
When you gain control of a holding with souls I occupied, sacrifice those souls. Each holding controlled by the player who controlled the holding loses X population, where X is the number of souls sacrificed.

Vessels.Name: Firebreather
Vessels.Effect:
Pilot.SYNC -> SYNC, Gunnner.FORCE -> FORCE,
Attack again at SYNC 1.

Vessels.Name: Palace of Heaven
Vessels.Effect: At the end of your turn, draw two cards.

Vessels.Name: Red Ascension Array
Vessels.Effect:
Req. Souls: 4
Mass Destruction (This vessel can target holdings. When it deals damage to a holding, destroy it and all descendants, works, and population there.)

Vessels.Name: Tsiolkovsky's Bane
Vessels.Effect: Slaver (if this ship would extinguish a soul, migrate that soul to a holding of your choice instead).

Vessels.Name: ECM Stealth Ship
Vessels.Effect:
Stealth,
When an opponent chooses a target, you may tap stealth ship to change the target (this includes attacks in combat).

Fates.Name: Hunter-killer Missile
Fates.Effect: Deal two damage to one target

Fates.Name: Beseech the Great Ones
Fates.Effect: Return a vessel or descendant from the past to play.

Fates.Name: Terror
Fates.Effect: Return a descendant to its owner's hand.

Fates.Name: Panic
Fates.Effect: The next time target enemy descendant or vessel is dealt damage this turn, it is destroyed.

Fates.Name: Expedition
Fates.Effect: Shuffle the System Deck and reveal four holdings, then Explore.

Fates.Name: Gain Ground
Fates.Effect: Gain control of target holding you occupy.

Fates.Name: Pillaging
Fates.Effect: Draw a card for every soul your descendants extinguished in combat this turn.

Fates.Name: Outmaneuver
Fates.Effect: Target descendant or vessel gets +1 FORCE or +1 SYNC.

Works.Name: Materia Mine
Works.Effect: Increase Materia production on this holding by 1 for every 3 souls.

Works.Name: Data Nexus
Works.Effect: Increase Data production on this holding by 1 for every 2 souls.

Works.Name: Anima Condenser
Works.Effect: Increase Anima production on this holding by 1 for every 2 souls.

Works.Name: Resource Amplifier
Works.Effect: Choose an element and double this holding's production of it.

Works.Name: Defense Grid
Works.Effect: Your holdings get +1 garrison and your descendants defending them get +1 SYNC.

Works.Name: Cloning Tower
Works.Effect: At the start of your turn, add 1m souls to this holding, then you may turn one of your descendants into a copy of another descendant you control.

Works.Name: Advanced R&D Center
Works.Effect: At the start of your next turn, all descendants you control gain Phase Dispersion Rifles. They can attack an opponent's PSYCHE with FORCE.

Works.Name: Teleportation Station
Works.Effect: At the beginning of each combat, you may move one of your descendants to the top of the SYNC array.

Works.Name: Hyperspace Conduit
Works.Effect: Once per turn, you may move a descendant or vessel between this holding and another you control at light speed.

Works.Name: Reproduction World
Works.Effect: You may take an additional Populate action on each of your turns.

Works.Name: Observatory
Works.Effect: Draw a card at the start of your turn.

Works.Name: Megafactory
Works.Effect: At the start of your turn, draw a card for every three souls on this holding.

Works.Name: Human Recomposition Zone
Works.Effect:
Tap, sacrifice all the souls on this holding: draw that many cards.
Build this work only on a non-martian holding.

Works.Name: Mobile Headquarters
Works.Effect:
Tap: units that attack from or defend this holding this turn get +1 FORCE/SYNC.
1m: Move the mobile HQ to a holding you control or occupy.

Works.Name: Neue Berlin Institute of Genomics
Works.Effect: Tap, sacrifice a descendant: search your deck for a descendant and put them into play. They gain "slow". Activate this ability at pre-warp speed.

Holdings.Name: The Berlin Anomaly
Holdings.Effect:
When The Berlin Anomaly enters, each player chooses a card from outside the game and exiles them face down under The Berlin Anomoly. 
Sacrifice one million souls: Take one of the exiled cards at random and put it into your hand.

Holdings.Name: Sanctuary Zone Alpha
Holdings.Effect: Take an additional populate action on each of your turns.

Holdings.Name: CEC-Prime
Holdings.Effect: At the start of your turn, up to one unit stationed here permanently gains Mental Fortitude (they may defend against FORCE attacks with PSYCHE).

Holdings.Name: Project BLACKLIGHT Facility
Holdings.Effect: At the start of your turn, up to one unit stationed here becomes unblockable until end of turn.

Holdings.Name: Free Earth Confederation Territory
Holdings.Effect: Take an additional Populate action on each of your turns.

Holdings.Name: Kaufmann-Engel Manifestation Zone
Holdings.Effect: Descendants with 2 or more PSYCHE or VECTOR quartered here may weave Fates as if they were in any combat, and for 1 less.

Holdings.Name: Himmelsburg Orbital Habitat
Holdings.Effect: When a player takes the Explore action, you may pay tap an untapped vessel you control to contest it.

Holdings.Name: Europa Deep Drilling Station
Holdings.Effect:
Exploring this holding or moving a unit here, including to attack, costs 1m.
Produces one additional materia.

Holdings.Name: The Kuiper Belt Array
Holdings.Effect: At the start of your turn, your descendants here gain +1 SYNC until end of turn.

Holdings.Name: The Lazarite Planetoid
Holdings.Effect: Your vessels and descendants deployed here can move and attack at lightspeed.

Holdings.Name: Mondreich
Holdings.Effect: Descendants here get +1 SYNC when they attack or defend Earth.

Holdings.Name: OLYMPUS Lunar Facility
Holdings.Effect: Capped at 1m souls.

Holdings.Name: Hydrogen Refueling Station Alpha
Holdings.Effect: Costs 1m to explore. This holding produces one additional materia. Any damage dealt to a work on this holding is enough to destroy it.

Holdings.Name: Neue Berlin
Holdings.Effect: When I hit 10 souls for the first time, search for a 3 or less cost descendant and station it here.

Holdings.Name: Phobos Command
Holdings.Effect: Units quartered here get +1 FORCE when attacking or defending a Martian holding.

Holdings.Name: Red Legion Training Complex
Holdings.Effect: Tap: Add +2 Garrison until end of combat.

Holdings.Name: Valles Marineris Deep Sanctuary
Holdings.Effect: When this holding is attacked, you may sacrifice 1 million souls to activate 'Downward Protocol' (prevent all damage to this holding this combat, its maximum souls becomes two).

Holdings.Name: Olympus Mons Disruption Zone
Holdings.Effect: The electromagnetic disruption from the Red Ascension Array's destruction shields your units from detection. Units stationed here cannot be targeted by enemy Fates unless the controller pays 2 additional resources. Vessels launched from this holding enter combat with Stealth until their first attack.

Holdings.Name: Ares Fabrication Complex
Holdings.Effect: Costs 1 to explore. This holding adds one additional materia. At the start of your turn, extinguish one soul here.

Holdings.Name: Mercury Solar Arrays
Holdings.Effect:
Costs 1 to explore. This holding is capped at one million souls.
Produces two materia.

Holdings.Name: New Plymouth
Holdings.Effect: You may pay 2 and discard a Fate card to gain control of an opponent's Fate card. You may choose new targets for it.

Holdings.Name: Secret Base
Holdings.Effect: Descendants attacking from this holding get +1 SYNC and +1 FORCE.

Holdings.Name: Thule Collective Meditation Hub
Holdings.Effect: At the start of your turn, choose a unit stationed here. Their PSYCHE increases by 1 permanently. Then, if their PSYCHE is 5, create two copies of them with quantum-entangled PSYCHE attributes (if one's PSYCHE is reduced to zero, all's are.)

Holdings.Name: Ceres Diplomatic Station
Holdings.Effect: With the controller's choice, any descendant may travel here at lightspeed.

Holdings.Name: Crimson Hollow
Holdings.Effect:
Costs 8m to explore. 

When a descendant first enters this holding, create Tsiolkovsky's Bane and gain control of it.
Holdings: “Once hidden in the outer debris of a collapsed moon, Crimson Hollow was the secret fortress of Admiral Varkas Korr, the most feared pirate of the Lost Cycle. Said to be carved from the husk of a slain celestial beast, the asteroid holds the wreckage of hundreds of raided ships—and, buried deep within, the intact bridge of Korr’s mythic vessel, Tsiolkovsky's Bane, a heavily-modified Firebreather.”

Holdings.Name: The Venus Quarantine Zone
Holdings.Effect: At the start of your turn, up to one unit stationed here gains the Venusian attribute (1a: switch places with another Venusian).
